title: Serious Packet Loss suddenly this past week
body: Honestly, I don't know how this stuff works all that well. I tried contacting spectrum and some IT guy said he made adjustments to my connection, but i'm still seeing packet loss. Is there anything more I can tell them or do on my end to fix the problem?

replies.body: Typically packet loss is on the ISP side of things. I would try reaching back out to them and letting them know it's still an issue, they may need to look into a specific node that you're being routed through. You can also hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if there's anyway they could help!
